title: Ovid Heroides 12 - we learn in line 2

content.question: In line 2 (et... toros), we learn that

choices.label: the youths sat down on ornate couches
bulls with decorated horns were sacrificed

content.answer: the youths sat down on ornate couches

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
